system.description: Advanced combat training with a focus on versatility and agility.

levelDescriptions.1: 2 attacks per melee round. +3 to roll with punch/fall/impact, and +3 to pull punch.
levelDescriptions.2: +3 to parry and dodge, +2 to strike, and disarm.
levelDescriptions.3: Kick attacks: Karate style kick (does 2D4 damage) and any four of choice, except jump kicks.
levelDescriptions.6: Critical strike on an unmodified roll of 18, 19 or 20.
levelDescriptions.13: Knockout/stun on an unmodified roll of 18, 19, or 20.
levelDescriptions.15: Death Blow on a roll of a natural 20 (if desired).
